content.raw:
While running SensorManager_TEST I've seen some segfaults in different sensors (RaySensor, CameraSensor) coming from IsActive() methods while accessing to publishers. With the form of:

```
to     function=0x4a1900 "T* boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::transport::Publisher]") at assert.c:103
#4  0x000000000046bafd in boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::transport::Publisher>::operator-> (
```

I also found a different one. I'm pretty sure that we are destroying a RaySensor Object while the method UpdateImpl() is running. UpdadeImpl() accesses to different objects (laserShape or scanPub) which are being destroyed while the method is running. segfaulting.
